recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook garlic until fragrant.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Drain spaghetti and mix with the sauce.
Serve with grated Parmesan on top.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok over medium heat.
Add ginger and cook until fragrant.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Spread mashed avocado evenly on the toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes and sea salt on top.
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Tacos
instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry skillet over medium heat.
Fill each tortilla with shredded chicken, lettuce, and tomatoes.
Top with sour cream and taco sauce.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Oatmeal Bowl
instructions: Cook oats with water or milk according to package instructions.
Transfer to a bowl and top with blueberries, honey, almond butter, and cinnamon.
Serve warm.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with lemon zest, dill, salt, and pepper.
Grill for 4-6 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Combine cooked quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Egg Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Stir in bell peppers, spinach, and cheddar cheese.
Pour the mixture into a greased muffin tin.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until set.
Serve warm.
